properties.address: Southern Court, Newport Ind. Estate, Launceston, Cornwall PL15 8EX
properties.description: We cater from everyone and have toys for children, magazines, books and puzzles. A warm welcome from The Foodbank and Launceston Community Church providing a friendly space next to the Foodbank Charity Shop. Everyone welcome... bring along your craft projects, knitting and art materials. Enjoy free hot drinks, homemade soup, light lunches and afternoon cake.
properties.title: Launceston Community Church

properties.description: This space is open to all every Thursday morning between 10-12. All are welcome to join us for a free cuppa and chat with other activities too.
properties.title: St. Cuthbert Mayne church hall

properties.address: Tamar Valley Methodist Church, Gunnislake, Cornwall PL18 9EP
properties.description: A modern, warm, light and welcoming church and social rooms. Modern kitchen and toilet facilities. Surrounded by a garden and car park.
properties.title: Tamar Valley Methodist Church

properties.address: Gateway 2 New Life, Gateway Centre, Madford Lane, Cornwall, Cornwall PL15 9TR
properties.description: The largest community centre in Launceston. We offer plenty of space to come and relax in our community cafe, Cafe Avodah.
properties.title: The Gateway Centre

properties.address: Treburley Social Club, Launceston, Cornwall PL15 9PU
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th November 2024** A community social club with a range of activities such as skittles, pool tables, darts, and board games. Free tea, coffee and biscuits are provided and there's a lovely log burner to keep you warm. Plenty of parking too.
properties.title: Treburley Social Club
